changeSet.author: scottmat
changeSet.sql:
update sequencing_run run set run.RUN_CARTRIDGE = (select runjoin.RUN_CARTRIDGE as flowcell_join from SEQUENCING_RUN run_view join SEQ_RUN_RUN_CARTRIDGES runjoin on runjoin.SEQUENCING_RUN = run_view.SEQUENCING_RUN_ID join lab_vessel flowcell on flowcell.LAB_VESSEL_ID = runjoin.RUN_CARTRIDGE where run.SEQUENCING_RUN_ID = run_view.SEQUENCING_RUN_ID) ;
update sequencing_run_aud run set run.RUN_CARTRIDGE = (select runjoin.RUN_CARTRIDGE as flowcell_join from SEQUENCING_RUN_aud run_view join SEQ_RUN_RUN_CARTRIDGES_aud runjoin on runjoin.SEQUENCING_RUN = run_view.SEQUENCING_RUN_ID join lab_vessel flowcell on flowcell.LAB_VESSEL_ID = runjoin.RUN_CARTRIDGE where run.SEQUENCING_RUN_ID = run_view.SEQUENCING_RUN_ID) ;

changeSet.author: scottmat
dryan
changeSet.sql: BEGIN FOR r IN ( SELECT TABLE_NAME, CONSTRAINT_NAME, OWNER FROM USER_CONSTRAINTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'LV_POS_MERCURY_SAMPLES' AND CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'U' ) LOOP EXECUTE IMMEDIATE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE( 'ALTER TABLE #OWNER#.#TABLE# DROP CONSTRAINT #CON#' , '#TABLE#',r.TABLE_NAME) , '#CON#',r.CONSTRAINT_NAME),'#OWNER#',r.OWNER); END LOOP; END;
